## LOCAL_NODE_PKEY variable

publicly available wallet for local nodes

**Signature:**

```typescript
LOCAL_NODE_PKEY =
  "0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80";
```
